staPresAlphaQAQCRpt.description: Station pressure quality assurance and quality control report for the alpha quality flag, which indicates if one or more quality analysis failed for a datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

staPresAlphaQM.description: Station pressure quality metric detailing the outcomes of the alpha quality flag over the averaging period, as a percent and detailed in NEON.DOC.001113

staPresBetaQAQCRpt.description: Station pressure quality assurance and quality control report for the beta quality flag, which indicates if one or more quality analysis could not be run for a datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

staPresBetaQM.description: Station pressure quality metric detailing the outcomes of the beta quality flag over the averaging period, as a percent and detailed in NEON.DOC.001113

staPresConsistencyPassQM.description: Station pressure quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the consistency test over the averaging period, as a percent

staPresConsistencyQAQCRpt.description: Station pressure quality assurance and quality control report for the consistency test, which indicates whether or not measurements are consistent with co-located measurements, (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

staPresFinalQF.description: Station pressure quality flag indicating whether a data product has passed or failed an overall assessment of its quality, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass)

altCoordinateSource.description: Alternate method used to collect or create spatial information

altCoordinateUncertainty.description: The horizontal distance (in meters) from the given altLatitude and altLongitude describing the smallest circle containing the whole of the Location. Zero is not a valid value for this term

altElevation.description: Alternate elevation (in meters) above sea level

altElevationUncertainty.description: Alternate uncertainty in elevation values (in meters)

altGeodeticDatum.description: Model used to measure horizontal position on the earth for alternate location coordinate

associatedTaxa.description: A list of taxa associated with the taxon at the time of its collection. References to taxa are preceded by the relationship

collectedBy.description: An identifier for the technician who collected the sample or specimen

coordinateUncertainty.description: The horizontal distance (in meters) from the given decimalLatitude and decimalLongitude describing the smallest circle containing the whole of the Location. Zero is not a valid value for this term

decimalLatitude.description: The geographic latitude (in decimal degrees, WGS84) of the geographic center of the reference area

decimalLongitude.description: The geographic longitude (in decimal degrees, WGS84) of the geographic center of the reference area

domainID.description: Unique identifier of the NEON domain

endDate.description: The end date-time or interval during which an event occurred

family.description: The scientific name of the family in which the taxon is classified

geodeticDatum.description: Model used to measure horizontal position on the earth

habitatDescription.description: Description of the habitat in which the event occurred

identificationQualifier.description: A standard term to express the determiner's doubts about the Identification

identificationReferences.description: A list of sources (concatenated and semicolon separated) used to derive the specific taxon concept; including field guide editions, books, or versions of NEON keys used

identifiedBy.description: An identifier for the technician who identified the specimen

morphospeciesIDRemarks.description: Technician notes about the morphospecies; free text comments accompanying the record

namedLocation.description: Name of the measurement location in the NEON database

nativeStatusCode.description: The process by which the taxon became established in the location

plantDescription.description: Description of the plant being collected for archive

recordedBy.description: An identifier for the technician who recorded the data

remarks.description: Technician notes; free text comments accompanying the record

scientificName.description: Scientific name, associated with the taxonID. This is the name of the lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined

startDate.description: The start date-time or interval during which an event occurred

tagCode.description: Code of domain-level unique identifier used to mark the individual

tagID.description: Domain-level unique identifier of tag used to mark the individual

taxonID.description: Species code, based on one or more sources

taxonIDRemarks.description: Technician notes about the specific taxon; free text comments accompanying the record

taxonRank.description: The lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined for the individual or specimen

uid.description: Unique ID within NEON database; an identifier for the record

voucherLifeStage.description: Life stage of the plant collected for voucher

archiveStartDate.description: Date that the sample was archived

externalRemarks.description: External lab notes; free text comments accompanying the record

sWatElevPersistencePassQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the persistence test for elevation of surfacewater over the averaging period, as a percent

sWatElevRangeFailQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the range test for elevation of surfacewater over the averaging period, as a percent

sWatElevRangeNAQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when the range test for elevation of surfacewater could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

sWatElevRangePassQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the range test for elevation of surfacewater over the averaging period, as a percent

sWatElevSpikeFailQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the spike test for elevation of surfacewater over the averaging period, as a percent

sWatElevSpikeNAQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when the spike test for elevation of surfacewater could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

sWatElevSpikePassQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the spike test for elevation of surfacewater over the averaging period, as a percent

sWatElevStepFailQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the step test for elevation of surfacewater over the averaging period, as a percent

sWatElevStepNAQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when the step test for elevation of surfacewater could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

sWatElevStepPassQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the step test for elevation of surfacewater over the averaging period, as a percent

startDateTime.description: Date and time at which a sampling is initiated

surfacewaterElevExpUncert.description: Expanded uncertainty for elevation of surfacewater

surfacewaterElevMean.description: Arithmetic mean of elevation of surfacewater

tempRHValidCalQAQCRpt.description: Temperature measures by RH sensor QAQC report for the valid calibration check, which indicates whether the measurements are within the valid calibration date range, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

collectionDateAccuracy.description: A numerical representation of the precision of the Collection Date given in days

collectionNotes.description: Comments or notes about the collection event

collectors.description: The full or abbreviated names of the individuals or team responsible for collecting the sample in the field

coordinateAccuracy.description: A decimal representation of the precision of the coordinates given in the decimalLatitude and decimalLongitude

countryOcean.description: The full, unabbreviated name of the country, major political unit, or ocean in which the organism was collected

depth.description: For organisms collected beneath the surface of a water body

elevationPrecision.description: A numerical representation of the precision of the elevation given in meters and is represented as greater or less than the elevation value

exactSite.description: Additional text descriptions regarding the exact location of the collection site relative to a geographic or biologically relevant landmark

latitude.description: The geographic latitude (in decimal degrees) of the geographic center of a location

longitude.description: The geographic longitude (in decimal degrees) of the geographic center of a location

identificationQualifier.description: A standard term to express the determiner's doubts about the Identification

identificationRemarks.description: Comments or notes about the identification

identifiedBy.description: An identifier for the technician who identified the specimen

identifiedDate.description: Date on which the sample, individual, or specimen was identified

immatureSpecimen.description: Sample contains immature specimen(s) for which target level of identification cannot be achieved

individualCount.description: Number of individuals of the same type

infraclass.description: The scientific name of the infraclass in which the taxon is classified

specificEpithet.description: The specific epithet (second part of the species name) of the scientific name applied to the taxon

collectionDateAccuracy.description: A numerical representation of the precision of the Collection Date given in days

collectionEventID.description: A optional event ID for submission purposes that allows for relational data support when multiple specimens are collected from a single site

collectionNotes.description: Comments or notes about the collection event

collectors.description: The full or abbreviated names of the individuals or team responsible for collecting the sample in the field

coordinateAccuracy.description: A decimal representation of the precision of the coordinates given in the decimalLatitude and decimalLongitude

countryOcean.description: The full, unabbreviated name of the country, major political unit, or ocean in which the organism was collected

depth.description: For organisms collected beneath the surface of a water body

depthPrecision.description: A numerical representation of the precision of the depth given in meters and is represented as greater or less than the depth value

elevationPrecision.description: A numerical representation of the precision of the elevation given in meters and is represented as greater or less than the elevation value

eventTime.description: The time or time of day during which the sample was collected

exactSite.description: Additional text descriptions regarding the exact location of the collection site relative to a geographic or biologically relevant landmark

gpsSource.description: The source of the latitude and longitude measurements

habitat.description: A category or description of the habitat in which the event occurred

latitude.description: The geographic latitude (in decimal degrees) of the geographic center of a location

longitude.description: The geographic longitude (in decimal degrees) of the geographic center of a location

namedLocation.description: Name of the measurement location in the NEON database

alphaQAQCRpt.description: Quality assurance and quality control report for the alpha quality flag, which indicates if one or more quality analysis failed for a datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

alphaQM.description: Quality metric detailing the outcomes of the alpha quality flag over the averaging period, as a percent and detailed in NEON.DOC.001113

betaQAQCRpt.description: Quality assurance and quality control report for the beta quality flag, which indicates if one or more quality analysis could not be run for a datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

betaQM.description: Quality metric detailing the outcomes of the beta quality flag over the averaging period, as a percent and detailed in NEON.DOC.001113

consistencyFailQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the consistency test over the averaging period, as a percent

consistencyNAQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when the consistency test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

consistencyPassQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the consistency test over the averaging period, as a percent

consistencyQAQCRpt.description: Quality assurance and quality control report for the consistency test, which indicates whether or not measurements are consistent with co-located measurements, (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

endDateTime.description: Date and time at which a sampling is completed

finalQF.description: Quality flag indicating whether a data product has passed or failed an overall assessment of its quality, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass)

finalQFSciRvw.description: Quality flag indicating whether a data product has failed a science review of its quality, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass/not-reviewed)

gapFailQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the gap test over the averaging period, as a percent

rangeFailQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the range test over the averaging period, as a percent

endDateTime.description: Date and time at which a sampling is completed

startDateTime.description: Date and time at which a sampling is initiated

TFPrecipBucketTips.description: Indicator of throughfall precipitation bucket tips

heaterMonitor.description: Heater sensed current which is reported in voltage using a scale factor of 4.6A/V

inletTemp.description: The inlet orifice temperature, which is monitored to control orifice heater operation for the primary precipitation sensor

internalTemp.description: Ambient temperature inside the sensor, which is monitored to control orifice heater operation for the primary precipitation sensor

orificeHeaterFlag.description: Heater flag indicating the number of orifice heaters that were operational for a measurement period, (i.e., 000 = off, 100 = one on, 110 = two on, and 111 = all three on)

precipAccumulationRate.description: Accumulation of precipitation calculated by internal calculations of the 3 strain gauges in the primary precipitation sensor

secPrecipBucketTips.description: Indicator of secondary precipitation bucket tip

strainGauge1FreqComp.description: The temperature compensated frequency reported by strain gauge 1 in the primary precipitation sensor

strainGauge1FreqRaw.description: The raw frequency reported by strain gauge 1 in the primary precipitation sensor (i.e., uncompensated for temperature)

strainGauge1Stability.description: Stability flag indicating if strain gauge 1 in the primary precipitation sensor is reporting a stable frequency (1 = stable, 0 = unstable, -1 = sensor failure)

strainGauge1Temp.description: Strain gauge 1 transducer temperature in the primary precipitation sensor

strainGauge1Weight.description: The weight reported by strain gauge 1 in the primary precipitation sensor

strainGauge2FreqComp.description: The temperature compensated frequency reported by strain gauge 2 in the primary precipitation sensor

strainGauge2FreqRaw.description: The raw frequency reported by strain gauge 2 in the primary precipitation sensor (i.e., uncompensated for temperature)

strainGauge2Stability.description: Stability flag indicating if strain gauge 2 in the primary precipitation sensor is reporting a stable frequency (1 = stable, 0 = unstable, -1 = sensor failure)

strainGauge2Temp.description: Strain gauge 2 transducer temperature in the primary precipitation sensor

strainGauge2Weight.description: The weight reported by strain gauge 2 in the primary precipitation sensor

strainGauge3FreqComp.description: The temperature compensated frequency reported by strain gauge 3 in the primary precipitation sensor

strainGauge3FreqRaw.description: The raw frequency reported by strain gauge 3 in the primary precipitation sensor (i.e., uncompensated for temperature)

strainGauge3Stability.description: Stability flag indicating if strain gauge 3 in the primary precipitation sensor is reporting a stable frequency (1 = stable, 0 = unstable, -1 = sensor failure)

strainGauge3Temp.description: Strain gauge 3 transducer temperature in the primary precipitation sensor

strainGauge3Weight.description: The weight reported by strain gauge 3 in the primary precipitation sensor

totalGaugeWeight.description: The combined weight from the 3 strain gauges in the primary precipitation sensor

totalPrecipDepth.description: The total depth reported by the internal calculations of the 3 strain gauges in the primary precipitation sensor

endDateTime.description: Date and time at which a sampling is completed

inletHeaters1QM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when one of the inlet heaters was on over the measurement period, as a percent

inletHeaters2QM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when two of the inlet heaters were on over the measurement period, as a percent

inletHeaters3QM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when all three of the inlet heaters were on over the measurement period, as a percent

inletHeatersNAQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when no heater information was available over the measurement period, as a percent

priPrecipFinalQF.description: Primary precipitation quality flag indicating whether a data product has passed or failed an overall assessment of its quality, detailed in NEON.DOC.000898 (0 = pass, 1 = fail)

priPrecipFinalQFSciRvw.description: Primary precipitation quality flag indicating whether a data product has failed a science review of its quality, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass/not-reviewed)

priPrecipNullQF.description: Primary precipitation quality flag for the null test, which indicates a missing datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

priPrecipNumPts.description: Number of five-minute bulk precipitation values that were used to compute the 30-minute bulk precipitation value

startDateTime.description: Date and time at which a sampling is initiated

endDateTime.description: Date and time at which a sampling is completed

exDeltaQF.description: Quality flag that indicates whether the depth change for any of the strain gauges was too extreme (0 = pass, 1 = fail)

gaugeNoiseQF.description: Quality flag that indicates there was too much variability among the strain gauge measurements and precipitation was set to zero for a time interval (0 = pass, 1 = fail)

heaterErrorQF.description: Quality flag that indicates whether the heaters were malfunctioning (0 = pass, 1 = fail)

inletHeaters1QM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when one of the inlet heaters was on over the measurement period, as a percent

inletHeaters2QM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when two of the inlet heaters were on over the measurement period, as a percent

inletHeaters3QM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when all three of the inlet heaters were on over the measurement period, as a percent

inletHeatersNAQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when no heater information was available over the measurement period, as a percent

lowDepthQF.description: Quality flag that that indicates whether one or more of the depth measurements from the strain gauges were too low, which is typically a sign of a broken strain gauge (0 = pass, 1 = fail)

missingWireInfoQF.description: Quality flag that indicates when measurements are invalid from two or more strain gauges and precipitation could not be calculated (0 = pass, 1 = fail)

overflowQF.description: Quality flag indicating the gauge was overflowing and precipitation could not be calculated (0 = pass, 1 = fail)

priPrecipFinalQF.description: Primary precipitation quality flag indicating whether a data product has passed or failed an overall assessment of its quality, detailed in NEON.DOC.000898 (0 = pass, 1 = fail)

priPrecipFinalQFSciRvw.description: Primary precipitation quality flag indicating whether a data product has failed a science review of its quality, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass/not-reviewed)

priPrecipNullQF.description: Primary precipitation quality flag for the null test, which indicates a missing datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

priPrecipValidCalQF.description: Primary precipitation quality flag for the valid calibration check detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

priorDepthQF.description: Quality flag indicating whether or not precipitation could calculated because the previous depth measurements were missing from two or more of the strain gauges (0 = pass, 1 = fail)

startDateTime.description: Date and time at which a sampling is initiated

unstableQF.description: Quality flag indicating whether or not two or more strain gauges were stable to allow for precipitation to be calculated, (0 = pass, 1 = fail)

wire1StabilityFailQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when strain gauge 1 stability failed over the measurement period, as a percent

wire1StabilityNAQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when strain gauge 1 stability information was not available  over the measurement period, as a percent

wire1StabilityPassQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when strain gauge 1 stability passed over the measurement period, as a percent

wire1StabilitySearchQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when strain gauge 1 was searching for stability over the measurement period, as a percent

wire2StabilityFailQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when strain gauge 2 stability failed over the measurement period, as a percent

wire2StabilityNAQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when strain gauge 2 stability information was not available  over the measurement period, as a percent

wire2StabilityPassQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when strain gauge 2 stability passed over the measurement period, as a percent

wire2StabilitySearchQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when strain gauge 2 was searching for stability over the measurement period, as a percent

wire3StabilityFailQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when strain gauge 3 stability failed over the measurement period, as a percent

wire3StabilityNAQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when strain gauge 3 stability information was not available  over the measurement period, as a percent

wire3StabilityPassQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when strain gauge 3 stability passed over the measurement period, as a percent

wire3StabilitySearchQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when strain gauge 3 was searching for stability over the measurement period, as a percent

wireNoiseQF.description: Quality flag that indicates whether one or more of the strain gauge's depth change was negative, resulting in setting precipitation to zero for a time interval (0 = pass, 1 = fail)

endDate.description: The end date-time or interval during which an event occurred

startDate.description: The start date-time or interval during which an event occurred

uid.description: Unique ID within NEON database; an identifier for the record

enumerationDifference.description: Percent difference in enumeration between the original sample and the quality checked sample

identifiedBy.description: An identifier for the technician who identified the specimen

identifiedDate.description: Date on which the sample, individual, or specimen was identified

individualCount.description: Number of individuals of the same type

laboratoryName.description: Name of the laboratory or facility that is processing the sample

qcIdentifiedBy.description: An identifier for the technician who quality checked the specimen

qcIndividualCount.description: Number of individuals of the same type in the quality checked sample

qcPercentSimilarity.description: Percent similarity of original taxonomy report and QC taxonomy report (identification + count)

remarks.description: Technician notes; free text comments accompanying the record

scientificName.description: Scientific name, associated with the taxonID. This is the name of the lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined

stationID.description: Identifier for station where sample was collected

uid.description: Unique ID within NEON database; an identifier for the record

division.description: The scientific name of the division in which the taxon is classified

family.description: The scientific name of the family in which the taxon is classified

form.description: The form (infraspecific name below the rank of infraspecific epithet) of the scientific name applied to the taxon

genus.description: The scientific name of the genus in which the organism is classified

identificationQualifier.description: A standard term to express the determiner's doubts about the Identification

order.description: The scientific name of the order in which the taxon is classified

parvdivision.description: The scientific name of the parvdivision in which the taxon is classified

scientificName.description: Scientific name, associated with the taxonID. This is the name of the lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined

tribe.description: The scientific name of the tribe in which the taxon is classified

variety.description: The variety (infraspecific name below the rank of infraspecific epithet) of the scientific name applied to the taxon

RHStatus.description: Status of the relative humidity sensor

RHAlphaQAQCRpt.description: Relative humidity quality assurance and quality control report for the alpha quality flag, which indicates if one or more quality analysis failed for a datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

RHAlphaQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric detailing the outcomes of the alpha quality flag over the averaging period, as a percent and detailed in NEON.DOC.001113

RHBetaQAQCRpt.description: Relative humidity quality assurance and quality control report for the beta quality flag, which indicates if one or more quality analysis could not be run for a datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

RHBetaQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric detailing the outcomes of the beta quality flag over the averaging period, as a percent and detailed in NEON.DOC.001113

RHConsistencyFailQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the consistency test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHConsistencyNAQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes when the consistency test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

RHConsistencyPassQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the consistency test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHConsistencyQAQCRpt.description: Relative humidity quality assurance and quality control report for the consistency test, which indicates whether or not measurements are consistent with co-located measurements, (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

RHFinalQF.description: Relative humidity quality flag indicating whether a data product has passed or failed an overall assessment of its quality, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass)

RHFinalQFSciRvw.description: Relative humidity quality flag indicating whether a data product has failed a science review of its quality, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass/not-reviewed)

RHGapFailQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the gap test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHGapNAQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes when the gap test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

RHGapPassQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the gap test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHGapQAQCRpt.description: Relative humidity quality assurance and quality control report for the gap test, which indicates that the datum is missing and is apart of a prolonged period of missing data, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass)

RHNullFailQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the null test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHNullNAQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes when the null test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

RHNullPassQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the null test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHNullQAQCRpt.description: Relative humidity quality assurance and quality control report for the null test, which indicates a missing datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

RHNumPts.description: Number of points used to calculate the arithmetic mean of relative humidity

RHPersistenceFailQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes  the failed outcomes of the persistence test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHPersistenceNAQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes when the persistence test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

RHPersistencePassQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the persistence test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHPersistenceQAQCRpt.description: Relative humidity quality assurance and quality control report for the persistence test, which indicates  whether there is a realistic fluctuation of values over a designated period of time, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

RHRangeFailQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the range test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHRangeNAQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes when the range test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

RHRangePassQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the range test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHRangeQAQCRpt.description: Relative humidity quality assurance and quality control report for the range test, which indicates whether a datum exceeds a realistic value, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

RHSensorErrorFailQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when the sensor error occurred over the averaging period, as a percent

RHSensorErrorNAQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when the sensor error was unknown over the averaging period, as a percent

RHSensorErrorPassQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when the sensor error was not occurred  over the averaging period, as a percent

RHSensorErrorQAQCRpt.description: Relative humidity quality assurance and quality control report for the sensor error flag, which indicates whether a sensor error occurred, detailed in NEON.DOC.000850 and NEON.DOC.000851 (1=error is detected, 0=no error, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

RHSpikeFailQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the spike test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHSpikeNAQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes when the spike test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

RHSpikePassQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the spike test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHSpikeQAQCRpt.description: Relative humidity quality assurance and quality control report for the spike test, which indicates whether or not a datum has been identified as a spike, detailed in NEON.DOC.000783 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

RHStdErMean.description: Standard error of the mean for relative humidity

RHStepFailQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the step test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHStepNAQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes when the step test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

RHStepPassQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the step test over the averaging period, as a percent

RHStepQAQCRpt.description: Relative humidity quality assurance and quality control report for the step test, which indicates whether unusual jumps in the data exist, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

RHValidCalFailQM.description: Relative humidity quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the valid calibration check over the averaging period, as a percent

alphaQAQCRpt.description: Quality assurance and quality control report for the alpha quality flag, which indicates if one or more quality analysis failed for a datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

alphaQM.description: Quality metric detailing the outcomes of the alpha quality flag over the averaging period, as a percent and detailed in NEON.DOC.001113

betaQAQCRpt.description: Quality assurance and quality control report for the beta quality flag, which indicates if one or more quality analysis could not be run for a datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

betaQM.description: Quality metric detailing the outcomes of the beta quality flag over the averaging period, as a percent and detailed in NEON.DOC.001113

consistencyFailQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the consistency test over the averaging period, as a percent

consistencyNAQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when the consistency test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

consistencyPassQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the consistency test over the averaging period, as a percent

consistencyQAQCRpt.description: Quality assurance and quality control report for the consistency test, which indicates whether or not measurements are consistent with co-located measurements, (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

endDateTime.description: Date and time at which a sampling is completed

finalQF.description: Quality flag indicating whether a data product has passed or failed an overall assessment of its quality, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass)

finalQFSciRvw.description: Quality flag indicating whether a data product has failed a science review of its quality, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass/not-reviewed)

flowFailQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the flow rate test over the averaging period, as a percent

flowNAQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes when the flow rate test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

flowPassQM.description: Quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the flow rate test over the averaging period, as a percent

flowQAQCRpt.description: Quality assurance and quality control report for the flow rate flag, which indicates whether the sensor is adequately aspirated, detailed in NEON.DOC.000646 and NEON.DOC.000654 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

buoyCompGapFailQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the gap test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompGapNAQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes when the gap test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompGapPassQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the gap test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompGapQAQCRpt.description: Buoy compass quality assurance and quality control report for the gap test, which indicates that the datum is missing and is a part of a prolonged period of missing data, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass)

buoyCompNullFailQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the null test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompNullNAQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes when the null test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompNullPassQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the null test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompNullQAQCRpt.description: Buoy compass quality assurance and quality control report for the null test, which indicates a missing datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

buoyCompPersistenceFailQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes  the failed outcomes of the persistence test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompPersistenceNAQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes when the persistence test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompPersistencePassQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the persistence test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompPersistenceQAQCRpt.description: Buoy compass QAQC report for the persistence test, which indicates  whether there is a realistic fluctuation of values over a designated period of time, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

buoyCompRangeFailQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the range test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompRangeNAQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes when the range test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompRangePassQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the range test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompRangeQAQCRpt.description: Buoy compass quality assurance and quality control report for the range test, which indicates whether a datum exceeds a realistic value, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

buoyCompSpikeFailQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the spike test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompSpikeNAQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes when the spike test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompSpikePassQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the spike test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompSpikeQAQCRpt.description: Buoy compass quality assurance and quality control report for the spike test, which indicates whether or not a datum has been identified as a spike, detailed in NEON.DOC.000783 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

buoyCompStepFailQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the step test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompStepNAQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes when the step test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompStepPassQM.description: Buoy compass quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the step test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyCompStepQAQCRpt.description: Buoy compass quality assurance and quality control report for the step test, which indicates whether unusual jumps in the data exist, detailed in NEON.DOC.011081 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

buoyWindDirAlphaQAQCRpt.description: Buoy wind direction quality assurance and quality control report for the alpha quality flag, which indicates if one or more quality analysis failed for a datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

buoyWindDirAlphaQM.description: Buoy wind direction quality metric detailing the outcomes of the alpha quality flag over the averaging period, as a percent and detailed in NEON.DOC.001113

buoyWindDirBetaQAQCRpt.description: Buoy wind direction quality assurance and quality control report for the beta quality flag, which indicates if one or more quality analysis could not be run for a datum, detailed in NEON.DOC.001113 (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

buoyWindDirBetaQM.description: Buoy wind direction quality metric detailing the outcomes of the beta quality flag over the averaging period, as a percent and detailed in NEON.DOC.001113

buoyWindDirCalmWindFailQM.description: Buoy wind direction quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the calm wind test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyWindDirCalmWindNAQM.description: Buoy wind direction quality metric that summarizes when the calm wind test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyWindDirCalmWindPassQM.description: Buoy wind direction quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the calm wind test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyWindDirCalmWindQAQCRpt.description: Buoy wind direction quality assurance and quality control report for the calm wind test, which indicates whether or not Buoy wind direction measurements were made during calm winds, (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))

buoyWindDirConsistencyFailQM.description: Buoy wind direction quality metric that summarizes the failed outcomes of the consistency test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyWindDirConsistencyNAQM.description: Buoy wind direction quality metric that summarizes when the consistency test could not be run over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyWindDirConsistencyPassQM.description: Buoy wind direction quality metric that summarizes the passed outcomes of the consistency test over the averaging period, as a percent

buoyWindDirConsistencyQAQCRpt.description: Buoy wind direction quality assurance and quality control report for the consistency test, which indicates whether or not measurements are consistent with co-located measurements, (1=fail, 0=pass, -1=NA (i.e., could not be run))
